Battlefront Miniatures Ltd (BFM FW003) The third edition of Flames Of War, The World War II Miniatures Game is a massive 448 page book split across three volumes. Rulebook Hardcover, 308 Pages The Rulebook allows you to take command of a company of soldiers and pit yourself against cunning opponents on the field of battle. With clearly laid out rules and intuitive diagrams, Flames Of War is an easy to learn, fast-paced wargame that allows you to recreate the battles that raged across Europe during WWII. Forces Softback, 100 Pages The Forces Book contains thirteen Intelligence Briefings from the four main nations involved in WWII: Germany, the United States, Great Britain and the Soviet Union. Whether you’re a new player or a seasoned veteran looking to start an army from a different nation, there is something in this volume for everyone. Hobby Softback, 40 Pages The Hobby Book is about the other aspects of the game, which are just as important as playing. In this book you will find information on the activities that surround Flames Of War and define it as a pastime, as well as painting and modelling guides to help get you started.
